Destiny: MOON

"Fly me to the moon"

Discover lunar Landmaks

  • the dark side of the moon, "The most mysterious place on the moon".
  • South Pole-Atiken Basin, "The 1,600 miles crater".
  • Mare Orientale, "The youngest impact basin"

Moon facts

  • With a radius of about 1,080 miles (1,740 km)
  • It's 238,855 miles away from the earth
  • 127 degrees Celsiuis when in full sun.
  • -173 degrees Celsiuis in darkness.
  • Has an exosphere, a very thin atmosphere.

"Come to the moon for your honeymoon"
